articles.title: How Queen Elizabeth reacted when asked 'have you ever met the Queen?' by American tourist who didn't recognise her - Newshub
articles.description: The reaction revealed the fun-loving side of her personality the public rarely saw.
articles.content:
She did not say she was referring to Balmoral.
Aware the castle was in the vicinity, the hiker then asked her if she had ever met the Queen, Griffin said.
"Quick as a flash she said: 'I haven't, bu… [+920 chars]
